channel.title: Bosco Automat on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Bosco Automat on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Pictures For Everyone
item.description: Editor’s Note: Hey all! My pal Andrew Egan, last seen writing on Tedium about the art of the DVD commentary, has a few thoughts on photo-developing technologies—and how they took pictures mainstream. It’s a lot to reflect on. Check it out! Today in Tedium: From Kodak and Canon to Facebook and Fotomat, a long line of companies have sought their fortunes via photographs. The personal connection we have with our pictures is easily exploitable but still within reach of nearly any budget.
